**Date:** July 15-16th, 2020 <br>
**Location:** [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Young_Stats_ISA)<br>
**Time:** 12.00pm WET Wednesday, July 15th 2020 - 12.00pm WET Thursday, July 16th 2020 <br>

The **#YISAPoster2020** Twitter Conference will be held entirely online over [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Young_Stats_ISA) and aims to provide an opportunity for Statistician and Data Scientist around the world to meet online, share thier research and engage in scientific debate.


### Join the #YISAPoster2020 event:
- **Register:** to submit a poster please register [here](https://forms.gle/krWf28HrcuBXxjra6). The closing date is **July 13th 2020**.

- **Tweet** your poster with a title, **#YISAPoster2020** and any other relevant hashtag(s)  â€“ during the 24h conference beginning 12:00pm WET July 15th 2020.

- **Discuss** and engage, throughout the 24h conference, with other researchers by commenting on their **#YISAPoster2020** posters as well as making sure to answer questions from the committee and other researchers on your **#YISAPoster2020** poster.

- **Prizes** will be given to people whose **#YISAPoster2020** posters are deemed best by our committee and the one who get more retweets/likes.
